sect3.title: SensitiveParameter Attribute
sect3.para: Added the #[\SensitiveParameter] attribute to redact sensitive data in backtraces.

sect3.title: error_log_mode INI directive
sect3.para: The error_log_mode INI directive has been added which allows setting the permissions for the error log file.

sect3.title: Enumerations properties in constant expressions
sect3.para: It is now possible to fetch properties of Enumerations in constant expressions.

sect3.title: Type System Improvements
sect3.para: It is now possible to use null and false as stand-alone types.
It is now possible to combine intersection and union types. The type needs to be written in Disjoint Normal Form (DNF).

sect3.title: Constants in Traits
sect3.para: It is now possible to define constants in traits.

sect3.title: Readonly Classes
sect3.para: Support for readonly on classes has been added.

sect2.title: cURL
sect2.para: Added the CURLINFO_EFFECTIVE_METHOD option, which returns the effective HTTP method in the return value of curl_getinfo.
Exposed multiple new constants from libcurl 7.62 to 7.80.
Added the curl_upkeep function to perform any connection upkeep checks.

sect2.title: DBA
sect2.para: The LMDB Driver now accepts the DBA_LMDB_USE_SUB_DIR or DBA_LMDB_NO_SUB_DIR flags to determine if it should create a subdirectory or not when creating a database file.

sect2.title: OCI8
sect2.para: Added the oci8.prefetch_lob_size INI directive and oci_set_prefetch_lob function to tune LOB query performance by reducing the number of round-trips between PHP and Oracle Databases when fetching LOBS. This is usable with Oracle Database 12.2 or later.

sect2.title: OpenSSL
sect2.para: Added AEAD support for the chacha20-poly1305 algorithm.

sect2.title: ODBC
sect2.para: Added the odbc_connection_string_is_quoted, odbc_connection_string_should_quote, and odbc_connection_string_quote functions. These are primarily used behind the scenes in the ODBC and PDO_ODBC extensions, but are exposed to userland for easier unit testing, and for user applications and libraries to perform quoting themselves.

sect2.title: PCRE
sect2.para: Added support for the n (NO_AUTO_CAPTURE) modifier, which makes simple (xyz) groups non-capturing. Only named groups like (?<name>xyz) are capturing. This only affects which groups are capturing, it is still possible to use numbered subpattern references, and the matches array will still contain numbered results.

sect2.title: Random
sect2.para: This is a new extension which organises and consolidates existing implementations related to random number generators. New and better RNGs are available with scope issues eliminated.
